summary: This document is an email chain from August 12, 2019, coordinating interviews of Bureau of Prisons personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) following Jeffrey Epstein's death. It details the logistics for interviewing staff, assigning FBI and OIG agents, and mentions subpoenas for some interviewees.

events.title: Coordination of BOP Interviews Post-Epstein Death
events.description: FBI and OIG agents coordinate to interview Bureau of Prisons personnel at MCC regarding the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death. Subpoenas are prepared for some staff.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated August 12, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
Interviews of Bureau of Prisons personnel are being urgently coordinated, with some staff to be served subpoenas.
Logistical challenges include avoiding press camped at MCC and interviewing staff at their residences if necessary.
Specific staff roles are mentioned, including one who 'wrote memo re Epstein needing a cell mate' and another who 'notified that Epstein needed a cellmate'.
An FBI agent is needed to accompany another agent to review technical components at MCC.
